BlackNightmare:

The femme smiled and she stood up, she gave a sweet quick kiss in 
Malice's cheek.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague/ Malice:
>  
> "No, he can't.  He is going to be offline for a long time, Malice 
nearly took his face off.  I suspect a full day to repair his face," 
the Sweep commander said.
>  
> "Let's get you to bed," Malice said to Blacknightmare, "We're all 
tired.  C'mon, I'll tuck you in," the male jested.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> "Yes..."said the feme"We have a dificult while.... Sis, are you 
sure 
> that he couldn't free himself?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice:
> >  
> > The male put his sword away, and held Blacknightmare close.
> > "It's alright, I'm alright, you're alright, eveyone is alright.  
> Let's get some sleep." 
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Blacknightmare:
> > 
> > The femme tembled, all emotions were striking her and she felt 
> > tired... emotionally exausted. She barely could keep her 
emotions.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Malice/ Hellplague:
> > >  
> > > The male let go of her arm and hugged her again.  Hellplague 
> > walked back to them after her trip to the med lab.
> > > "I locked him in the chamber, he won't come out until I say 
so," 
> > Hellplague said, smiling.
> > > 
> > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > BlackNightmare:
> > > 
> > > "It's nothing"said the femme"they're just scratches, they will 
> > heal 
> > > soon"
> > >

> <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > Malice/ Hellplague/ Injustice:
> > > >  
> > > > Malice put his free arm around the femme, hugged her close.  
> He 
> > > noticed a scratch on her arm, and with his free arm and pulled 
> one 
> > > of her arms from around him and examined the scratches 
closely.  
> > > Hellplague began to drag the groaning Injustice to the med lab 
> for 
> > > some time in the CR chamber.
> > > > 
> > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > BlackNightmare:
> > > > 
> > > > the femme ran and huged him. in her arms she has scratches 
> that 
> > > > Injustice had done to her.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > >

> > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > Malice/ Hellplague:
> > > > >  
> > > > > Malice did not hear Blacknightmare and continued his march 
> to 
> > > the 
> > > > clone.  Knowing what he was going to do, and how it would 
> > endanger 
> > > > them all, Hellplague ran and punched Malice in the face, 
> > knocking 
> > > > him off balance for a moment.  He was dazed a moment, then 
> > looked 
> > > > around, to his clone, to Hellplague, then to Blacknightmare.
> > > > > "Yeah... I'm fine.... I think," he said in a far off voice.
> > > > > 
> > > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Blacknightmare:
> > > > > 
> > > > > "MALICE!!!!! Are you OK?" said worried the femmewhile she 
> ran 
> > > > > towards him
> > > > >

> but 
> > > she 
> > > > > saw she was too late.  Injustice pried the door open and 
got 
> > one 
> > > > > foot in the door.  That was as far as he got, because he 
> woke 
> > > > Malice 
> > > > > up.  The sleeping, prone form of Malice jumped off the bed 
> and 
> > > > > cleared the distance between him and Injustice in less 
than 
> a 
> > > > > second, a clawed arm raised.  Malice slashed the clone 
> across 
> > > the 
> > > > > face, cutting deep.  he clone staggered back, hands 
covering 
> > his 
> > > > > face, yelling.  Malice then drew his sword, and walked 
> toward 
> > > the 
> > > > > clone to finish him off.
